member.name: T:SLaB.Navigation.ContentLoaders.PageResource.PageResourceContentLoader
member.summary: Mimics the behavior of the built-in PageResourceContentLoader, but also works against dynamically-loaded libraries.

member.name: M:SLaB.Navigation.ContentLoaders.PageResource.PageResourceContentLoader.CreateLoader
member.summary: Creates an instance of a LoaderBase that will be used to handle loading.
